value.fullName: I know a cancer diagnosis can steal childhoods from children and I'd like to help give those things back.
value.label: a. I know a cancer diagnosis can steal childhoods from children and I'd like to help give those things back.

value.fullName: If my child or grandchild was diagnosed with cancer, I know I'd really appreciate Camp Quality being there.
value.label: b. If my child or grandchild was diagnosed with cancer, I know I'd really appreciate Camp Quality being there.

value.fullName: I want to help entire families affected by a childhood cancer diagnosis.
value.label: c. I want to help entire families affected by a childhood cancer diagnosis.
